name.en: Basics of the Satellite Communications Industry

department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.en: With the growth of the satellite communications sector, a growing number of companies in Taiwan have been working to customize or develop new products and services for the space and ground segments of this sector. This class introduces the satellite communications industry in Taiwan and is organized in conjunction with the Industrial Development Bureau (IDB) of the Ministry of Economic Affairs. Weekly lectures are provided by visiting lecturers from companies participating in the summer space technology internship program organized by IDB, introducing the needs, products, and development programs taking place at these companies. The intent is to introduce satellite communications and related companies in Taiwan for students intending to apply for the IDB‘s space technology summer internship program. Due to the instructors of this course being industry representatives, the expected language is Mandarin.
goal.ch: 衛星通訊產業日益興盛，本校與經濟部產業發展署的太空產業供應鏈計畫團隊合作，由多間企業提出衛星地面終端、太空（衛星）相關研發專題，協助媒合大專校院學生到企業研習、研發衛星通訊相關產品與服務。本課程的授課目標為大專校院資通訊、太空科系或跨域(其他理工科系)等有意報名參加實習計畫的大三以上學生、碩博生的基礎先修課程。目標是集結參加實習計畫之企業業師，讓多元背景學生認識國內衛星通訊產業發展與需求。

content.en:
This class is intended for undergraduate students of year 3 or above, as well as graduate students with an interest in the commercial space industry in Taiwan, with an emphasis on satellite communications. Students with backgrounds in space, communications, or related fields are especially encouraged to apply. The intent is to allow students to develop a better understanding of the domestic space industry, while also providing an opportunity for students interested in applying for the summer space technology internship program organized by IDB to decide on which companies they are interested in applying to.
This course is organized into five modules with specific topics subject to change depending on the companies participating:
1. Basics of Satellite Communications:
a. Non Terrestrial Networks
b. Low Earth Orbit (LEO) Satellite Constellations and their Applications.
2. System Integration and Terminals:
a. LEO Satellite Ground Stations and Architecture
b. Integration of Satellite Constellations and Ground Networks
3. Key Components:
a. High Frequency Substrates
b. Baseband ICs, Beamforming ICs, and Application Examples
c. Antenna and Radio Frequency Materials, Fabrication, and Characteristics
4. Antenna Subsystems:
a. Basic Antenna Theory and Antenna Interfaces
b. Phased Array Antennas and Satellite Applications
c. Ground Station Tracking
5. Indoor and Outdoor System Interfaces
a. Baseband Software and RF Modems
b. LEO Satellite Ground Station Indoor and Outdoor Subsystems
6. Introductions and Networking with Space Industry Representatives
content.ch:
本課程的授課目標為大專校院資通訊、太空科系或跨域(其他理工科系)等有意報名參加實習計畫的大三以上學生、碩博生的基礎先修課程。目標是集結參加實習計畫之企業業師，讓多元背景學生認識國內衛星通訊產業發展與需求。本課程分為五大單元與主題（內容會隨業師名單調整）：
1. 衛星通訊入門
a. 非地面通訊網路(NTN)簡介
b. 低軌道衛星通訊系統之特性與應用
2. 系統整合終端
a. 低軌道衛星地面站系統架構解析
b. 低軌道衛星系統與地面行動通訊網路之整合
3. 關鍵零組件
a. 高頻(高速)基板
b. 基頻晶片、波束成形晶片應用實務
c. 天線及射頻元件與模組之材料、製程與特性介紹
4. 天線次系統
a. 天線原理與多輸入多輸出天線簡介
b. 陣列天線系統於衛星通訊之應用
c. 地面站天線追蹤技術
5. 室內外設備連結次系統
a. 基頻軟體定義無線電數據機簡介
b. 低軌道衛星地面站室內外設備次系統
6. 企業衛星或太空專題分享與交流
